posts.postText:
hello I'm Luamerava or just Lua/Luam =D
I was on NNJG servers on and off for the past 7 months or so, but now I'm on there all the time. =D
~I am a female, though I'm not looking for trolling or whatnot so please don't bother since you won't
get a negative reaction.
~I'm 21 years old and I'm all about having fun. =D
~I'm a well-collected gal even when annoyed. 
~I'm pretty much a regular on the TTT server, though I just recently found out about this website
when loving Moon decided to put a bounty on me -_-. lol 
<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3<3
Someone told me to knife you in the crotch...
LUMA, nnjg ttt loves you back. <3
Don't forget. I'm banning you for abandonment. Forever. No parole
